Plot: A young boy named Kubo must locate a magical suit of armor worn by his late father in order to defeat a vengeful spirit from the past.
Title: Kubo and the Two Strings
Writer: Marc Haimes (screenplay), Chris Butler (screenplay), Shannon Tindle (story by), Marc Haimes (story by)
Actors: Charlize Theron, Art Parkinson, Ralph Fiennes, George Takei
